title: QATAR MOEHE
client: Qatar Ministry of Education and Higher Education
description: A digital learning and examination management platform enabling students, teachers, and administrators to collaborate effectively and securely.
challenge: The ministry faced difficulties in managing nationwide online examinations, tracking student progress, and ensuring platform scalability during peak usage. Legacy portals lacked accessibility, multilingual support, and modern security compliance.
solution: Developed a scalable cloud-based e-learning and assessment platform with role-based dashboards, real-time analytics, AI-driven proctoring for exams, and multi-language support. Integrated secure authentication with national ID systems and ensured mobile-first design for accessibility.
results: Successfully supported over 500,000+ students and teachers during nationwide online examinations
Ensured 99.9% uptime during peak usage
Enhanced accessibility with Arabic-English bilingual support
Improved data security and compliance with international education standards
features: Role-based dashboards for students, teachers, and administrators

title: AI-PILOT
description: AI to Revolutionize Child Height Measurement with 98–99% accurate height estimation, BLE-enabled measurement devices, and instant BMI calculation.
challenge: Accurate child height measurement is critical for nutrition planning, but traditional methods are error-prone, time-consuming, and not scalable in Anganwadi centers.
solution: An AI-powered anthropometric model integrated with BLE-enabled devices to provide accurate height estimation, real-time BMI calculation, and data-driven personalized nutrition recommendations. The solution is deployed as part of a real-time child health monitoring system.
results: 98–99% accuracy in child height estimation
Enabled real-time BMI calculation for better nutrition tracking
Pilot successfully implemented with UP Government Anganwadis
Supports personalized nutrition plans for children

title: Baladi Express Mart
description: A smart retail solution integrating online, mobile, and offline shopping with real-time inventory visibility and AI-driven personalization for a seamless customer journey.
challenge: Baladi Express faced challenges in providing a unified shopping experience. Customers experienced inconsistent pricing, stock mismatches across channels, and limited personalized recommendations, which led to lower engagement and lost sales opportunities.
solution: We implemented an AI-powered personalization engine with unified inventory management across all channels (web, mobile app, and physical stores). The system provides real-time stock visibility, personalized product recommendations, and seamless checkout experiences, ensuring consistency and convenience across platforms.
results: 35% increase in online conversion rate within the first 6 months
50% improvement in inventory turnover due to real-time stock synchronization
25% boost in customer lifetime value through AI-driven recommendations and loyalty features

title: Single View
description: Comprehensive IT and digital transformation services provider delivering innovative solutions in cloud, cybersecurity, enterprise systems, and smart technologies.
challenge: Organizations face challenges in achieving seamless digital transformation, managing complex IT environments, and ensuring robust cybersecurity while maintaining agility.
solution: Delivered tailored digital solutions including cloud computing, data analytics, enterprise applications, and cybersecurity frameworks to optimize operations and enhance business resilience.
results: Enabled end-to-end digital transformation for multiple enterprises
Improved operational efficiency and decision-making with data-driven solutions
Enhanced cybersecurity posture and compliance with global standards

title: SMSA Express
description: A trusted logistics partner offering comprehensive express, freight, e-commerce, and specialized mailroom and healthcare delivery solutions across both domestic and international markets.
challenge: Businesses across industries—from healthcare to e-commerce—required a logistics provider that could handle speed-sensitive deliveries, customs clearance, and integrated shipping solutions, all while ensuring reliability across a vast geographic footprint.
solution: SMSA developed a robust, multi-modal logistics network that includes express courier services, air/sea/road freight, customs clearance, e-commerce fulfillment, mailroom management, and healthcare sample delivery—with digital tracking and optimized operations across 230 countries.
results: Seamless delivery network covering 230 countries
Enhanced e-commerce fulfillment accelerating delivery timelines
Specialized mailroom and healthcare sample services improving operational efficiency for key institutions

title: KPMG Digital Transformation
description: End-to-end advisory and execution support for organizations navigating digital transformation—encompassing AI, cloud, ERP modernization, cybersecurity, and strategic change management.
challenge: Organizations faced fragmented legacy systems, lack of a unified digital strategy, heightened cyber threats, and rapidly evolving market demands that strained scalability and operational agility.
solution: KPMG designed bespoke digital transformation roadmaps, leveraging AI-powered platforms like KPMG Workbench, cloud infrastructure, automation tools, and robust cybersecurity frameworks. The firm also deployed strategic alliances—such as with Google Cloud and SAP—to deliver accelerated, resilient modernization.
results: Accelerated transformation governance and execution through KPMG’s multi-agent AI platform, Workbench
Enabled quick innovation with unified tax (Digital Gateway), advisory (Velocity), and audit (Clara) platforms
Enhanced organizational resilience with scalable, cloud-native infrastructures

title: StudyFox AI
description: An AI-powered learning assistant that transforms how students study—providing real-time quiz solving, flashcards, mind mapping, and interactive document/video chat tools for enhanced academic performance.
challenge: Students often struggle with fragmented study tools that lack personalization, context-aware feedback, and real-time support, making academic preparation inefficient and overwhelming.
solution: Developed an integrated AI learning platform featuring real-time quiz solving, smart flashcard generation, interactive mind maps, document (PDF) chat, and video (YouTube) chat—all driven by adaptive AI to deliver personalized, engaging learning paths.
results: Instant quiz answers with step-by-step explanations for deeper comprehension
Smart flashcard and spaced repetition approaches improving retention
Mind mapping and content chat tools enhancing contextual understanding
Available across platforms via Chrome extension and web app for seamless access

title: 360Taxi Dispatch System
description: A powerful cloud-based taxi dispatch solution offering real-time vehicle tracking, VoIP integration, automated routing and fare estimation, and advanced job assignment mechanisms—all accessible via browser with zero on-site installation.
challenge: Taxi operators faced inefficiencies managing fragmented dispatch workflows, lacking centralized tools to monitor vehicles, assign jobs accurately, and maintain consistent performance across fleets.
solution: Developed 360Taxi, a cloud-native dispatch platform integrating VoIP caller ID, live vehicle status updates, auto-address completion, dynamic job queues, smart assignment logic (zone, FIFO, nearest, best), fare estimation, route calculation, text notifications, and automatic reporting—all without any on-site installation.
results: Eliminated manual dispatch processes with fully browser-based operations
Improved response times and fleet utilization via intelligent job assignment
Enhanced customer experience with automated fare estimates and real-time SMS alerts
Delivered rich reporting tools for shift tracking, driver performance, and exception handling
